NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
YARROW: Cassava: The <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> will soon be launched! Are you ready to launch the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> ahead of us?
2
1
CASSAVA: I am ready, Yarrow. A memory statue aboard the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> has already been paired with me!
3 2
YARROW: Wonderful! Using the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station's</color> secondary negative time interval, you should be able to see 6 seconds into the future after the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> is launched.
4 2
YARROW: If all goes as planned, I should instantaneously receive memories from the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project,</color> before sending you the order to shut off the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station!</color>
5 4
CASSAVA: Yarrow, is everything alright? You were to write to me with news of the outcome after launching the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project!</color>
6 5
CASSAVA: I experienced several intervals of the 6-second negative time interval, before shutting it off to write to the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> to learn if something had happened.
7 6
YARROW: Cassava! I-I apologize. I lost track of time trying to learn what happened myself, after failing to receive any memories from 22 minutes into the future..
8 7
CASSAVA: Oh, no... The only thing that could mean is that.. The <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> did not work.
DSS R9 8
DSS R10 8
